name: Welcome
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page.
This is a brief introduction and will be replaced soon. 
My name is *Roi Mallo*, I'm from A Coru√±a (Spain) and I enjoy doing software vulnerability research, source code analysis and reverse engineer. 
Currently I have my own company where I research ring0 and learn about the state of the art exploiting techniques. Some of my successful research was in firms like:

```
- Microsoft
- Apple
- HP
- IBM
```

This is a code snippet:
`void routine(char *, char *, unsigned int)`
